name: Battle Droid T1
description:
FEATURES
  • Old school metroidvania style game play with a similar level of old school difficulty.
  • Over 150 areas to explore and clear of enemies.
  • Select from five unique special weapons to equip.
  • Collect gears and use them to upgrade and replenish your droids shield and ammo supply.
  • Great soundtrack.
  • Top 10 local military rank and scoring awarded even if you can not complete the mission.
  • Quit and restore game at any time without losing progress.
